name: HAK - Hand Action Keyboard - A Wearable Input Device That Does Not Require Physical Touch
description: HAK is a wearable input device that tracks the movements of fingers and wrists, converting them into text or cursor inputs, as if it came from the world of science fiction. All hand movements for input can be completed in mid-air, reducing spatial constraints compared to traditional planar input devices.
